Balancer
A 2 wheeled self-balancing bot
COMPETITION

The goal of the balancer competition is to build a self balancing two wheeled robot, that can drive for 6 meters and stand still without falling over. For extra points, teams may attempt to also tackle a variety of obstacles, such as speed bumps, uneven surfaces and traffic cones that are in the way.

DESIGN

The Balancer robot looks a lot like a mini-segway. Our goal this year is to compete at Robogames 2017 in the Spring and tackle both the standard challenge as well as some of the obstacles.
